Settings.Full: Tracks let you crawl up and over pretty much anything, just don't expect speed.
Wheels are efficient and speedy. Bonus movement on roads, slowed in rough terrain.
Hover: King of open terrain and water but impeded by forests, and rough terrain. Has trouble climbing steep hills.
VTOL: Flies over all terrain, ignores fire, landmines and most other terrain effects. Speed loss in low pressure atmosphere.
AirShips are very slow but heavily armed Aerial Units
Structure increased by {0} and Armor by {1} in rotor location.
Armored Motive systems require additional critical hits to destroy.
Critical Hits to this system will slow or immobilize this unit.
Critical hits on the Crew decrease maximum Evasive Pips or destroy the vehicle.
Critical hits to the Turret system reduce Accuracy and increase Recoil
Critical hits to the Coolant system will decrease Energy weapon damage output.
Infantry Compartment can hold up to {0} Battle Armor Squads
